titleStmt.title: An exposition of the XI. XII and XIII. chapters of the Revellation wherein most of the matters of greatest moment contained in the booke of the Reuelation are vnfolded / by a late writer, whose certaine name is not knowne to the publisher hereof, onely these two letters T.L. are in his aduertisement to Queene Elizabeth ; the contents whereof are in the next page.
titleStmt.author: T. L.

notesStmt.note: Name of publisher suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
